text_logic_form: The line $XU$ is tangent to the circle $V$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $XU$ is tangent to the circle $V$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $UV$ is $7$ units.
The length of the line $UX$ is $12$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $X$ and $V$.
Point $A$ also lies on the circle $V$.
line_instances: The line $UV$ is a secant line of the circle $V$.
The line $UX$ is a tangent line to the circle $V$.
circle_instances: There is a circle $V$ with center at point $V$ and radius $2.0$ units.
